identify.fields.name: Your business name
identify.help.name: As guests know you (e.g. 'Pizzeria Roma').
identify.help.address: City/postal code is enough, we'll find suggestions.
identify.error.noCandidates: We couldn't find your business. Please check spelling or add website.
identify.error.ambiguous: We found multiple matches. Select your business from the list.
identify.error.rateLimit: Take a breath – too many requests. Try again in a few minutes.
identify.error.server: That didn't work on our end. Try again later.
teaser.title: Your local visibility: {score}%
teaser.description: You rank {benchmark_pos} in your category. {quick_win} can help you quickly.
teaser.error.noEvidence: Currently no usable data found. Add website/Instagram for better results.
doi.info: We'll send you the complete report via email. Please confirm briefly (Double-Opt-In).
doi.sent: Check your inbox – Subject 'Your Visibility Report'
doi.disclaimer: No risk, no spam. You can unsubscribe anytime.
actions.intro: Quick wins first: These steps will likely bring you the most in a short time.
actions.story: Tell why guests love you – e.g. {usp}. View suggestion.
actions.image: Show {top_dish} with price and opening hours. View suggestion.
actions.roi: Forecast (non-binding): +{euros} € / month when implemented. Source & assumptions in report.
actions.flow: Review suggestion → Optionally adjust → Approve for posting
og.title: How visible is {business_name}?
og.description: Result in 1 minute: Visibility, opportunities, next steps.
result.top_actions.title: This brings you the most today
result.top_actions.body: These 3 steps will noticeably increase your visibility.
result.score.title: Your visibility
